content: you can help support more free patterns by purchasing the ad free written pdf pattern link to free tutorial is above & at the bottom of this description crochet choker pattern & video tutorial 1 this is not your typical crochet jewelry the crochet choker is simple enough for anyone to follow you will have the option of using crochet thread or worsted weight yarn in this pattern the choice is up to you this is a beginner to intermediate pattern video instructions are included this is written in us crochet terminology feel free to message me with any questions or if you notice a mistake i ll be glad to fix it and update the pattern feel free to sell any items made from this pattern but please do not sell the pattern itself or publish it anywhere please also give pattern credit to littlejohn s yarn 1 https //youtu be/0zcqh8iplpg https //youtu be/0zcqh8iplpg
